column6: Oh man, it is not a good day for the New Avengers.  Someone has invented a power disrupter and unleashed it in New York City.  The heroes have fallen. Some are hurt bad, others near death.  Who will rise to the challenge and save the day?  A very important DARK REIGN issue.  Something big happens.  Not going to tell you what it is but it happens on page 17, panel 4. Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller:Stuart Immonen | colorist:Dave McCaig
